issue.title: [C++][Doc] Document supported Parquet features
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10918](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10918). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should document the Parquet features supported by our C++ implementation.

comments.body:
